title: Fair Coin
text: Since the coin is fair, all outcomes are equally likely

title: Possible Outcomes
text: There are $$8$$ possible outcomes: HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, or TTT (where H is heads and T is tails)

title: Three Heads
text: Getting heads $$3$$ times occurs in only $$1$$ of the $$8$$ possible outcomes. Thus the probability of getting $$3$$ heads is $$\frac{1}{8}$$
